wikipedia_page.main:
Bradley Smith (born 21 February 1991) is a former British Racing Drivers' Club (BRDC) Rising Star and sports car driver from Essex, United Kingdom.
He is the Sunoco Prize winner and raced in the Rolex 24 at Daytona in 2014.

response: Brad or Bradley Smith may refer to:
*Bradley Smith (photographer) (1910–1997), American magazine photographer, writer, and photojournalist
*Bradley Smith (law professor) (born 1958), political scientist and former Federal Election Commission chairman
